title: Ambient Video Game Music - Sailing Ship 2
description: Set sail once again with the anticipated sequel to our immersive ocean-themed ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Set sail once again with the anticipated sequel to our immersive ocean-themed ambience tracks. This collection of 10 tracks further enriches the sonic experience of a sea voyage aboard an old sailing ship, providing game developers with an even wider range of maritime sounds that amplify the essence of the high seas.


Each pack in this sequel comes alive with the enhanced sounds of an old sailing ship braving the open waters. The creaking of the wooden hull is more detailed, carrying the whisper of every timber straining against the might of the ocean. These sounds convey a sense of age and resilience, echoing the countless stories of seafaring voyages that the ship has weathered.


Intensifying the auditory experience are the amplified sounds of waves crashing against the ship's side. These packs capture the ebb and flow of the ocean with greater nuance, ranging from the delicate lapping of calm seas to the furious roar of a stormy onslaught, immersing players in a maritime environment that's alive with the moods of the sea.

Unifying these elements is a new track that further elevates the seafaring ambience. This soundtrack flows seamlessly with the ship's rhythm and the ocean's undulations, its melodies reflecting the profound awe and respect that the open sea commands.


This sequel is an invaluable addition for game developers looking to deepen their nautical-themed environments. With enhanced sounds and a more dynamic track, this collection promises to draw players deeper into the life of a sailor, offering them a captivating voyage through the unpredictable and majestic high seas. The rich auditory experience will resonate with players, allowing them to feel every spray of the ocean and every groan of the wooden hull as if they were truly sailing the open seas.



This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
